entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Hopedale
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:26 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hopedale 03:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: -8.0°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 this evening then steady.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 6 this evening then steady. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 15. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023
